translations: n.教权；（天主教的）教诲职责

sentences.sentence: If Catholics were only faithful to the teachings of the Magisterium, he wrote, all would be well.
sentences.translation: 他写道，如果天主教徒只忠心于教权的教导，那么一切就都好了。

sentences.sentence: Personal conscience and reason should not be set in opposition to the moral law or the Magisterium of the Church.
sentences.translation: 个人的良心和理性不宜与道德律或教会的训导背道而驰。

sentences.sentence: The church he loved was celibate, hostile to women priests and set against gays; if Catholics were only faithful to the teachings of the Magisterium, he wrote, all would be well.
sentences.translation: 他热爱的教派主张禁欲主义，反对妇女作牧师并反对同性恋；他写道，如果天主教徒只忠心于教权的教导，那么一切就都好了。
